metadata.title: CVE-2024-36884 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:iommu/arm-smmu: Use the correct type in nvidia_smmu_context_fault() Thiswas missed because of the function pointer indirection.nvidia_smmu_context_fault() is also installed as a irq function, and the'void *' was changed to a struct arm_smmu_domain. Since the iommu_domain isembedded at a non-zero offset this causes nvidia_smmu_context_fault() tomiscompute the offset. Fixup the types.
